00011 // ------ Define sound effect no. ------//
00012 // note : wave file should be less than 64k in size, otherwise
00013 // the offset generated by LIBxxx.EXE is not correct
00014 //
00015 
00016 // ------ Define constant -------//
00017 #define MAX_SE_CACHED 32
00018 // a no. of sound effect is taken care for those are requested
00019 // this cycle or last cycle
00020 
00021 // ------ Define Struct SERequest ------//
00022 
00023 #define MAX_SE_STORE 4
00024

00027     char  *wave_ptr;

00032 
00033     void  add_request(RelVolume);
00034     int max_entry();
00035     void  remove_request(int slot);
00036     void  clear_request();
00037 };
